lead_paragraph: KUHN--Edward, 85, of Huntington, NY died peacefully on January 31, 2014. Esteemed nuclear physicist; WWII veteran; devoted family man; haiku poet; lover of classical music, the arts and The New York Times. Beloved husband of 55 years of Judy, devoted father of Donna (Dr. Samuel) Pesin , cherished grandfather of Elyssa (Jeff) Kotzen and Jennifer Pesin, adoring great-grandfather of Skylar Kotzen. Services privately held.
